source.author: Conn, B.J.
source.title: Xyridaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons

leads.lead_text: Leaves up to 10 (–c. 20) cm long; bracts all about the same
Leaves (15–) 25–60 cm long; lower sterile bracts progressively smaller towards base of inflorescence
Leaves 10–15 (–c. 20) cm long; inflorescence borne on an axis (19–) 25–90 cm long
Leaves 3–5 cm long; inflorescence borne on an axis 13–25 cm long
